column1: Indian, 5'3, regrew my virginity; Roast me! Do better than IT and curry, arranged marriage and taxi; I say again, ROAST ME!
Gay saudi that lives in bahrain to avoid getting executed. I love watching game of thrones and mlp. I've probably heard it all so i bet you cant say anything that i havent heard.

All of the people I usually talk to when I want attention are busy, so go ahead and roast me.
